doc.title: Himalayan Bears from India
doc.plot: Here are a few of the foreigners; but those with whom we do not fancy coming in contact. "They are good in a pinch." However, the film is very interesting, as all pictures must be of animals rarely seen in this part of the country. They are looked on as curiosities, but you would more than have your curiosity aroused should they succeed in reaching you. "They have good reach, too." These animal films are decidedly in a class by themselves, and you cannot fail to be a winner if you buy them.
